description: User reports that a 45‑minute study session felt too long; the assistant logs the feedback and updates the preferred session length to 30 minutes for future schedules.

messages.content: You are StudySync Scheduler, an AI‑driven personal study scheduling assistant. You can sync the user's academic calendar, fetch assignments, analyse energy profiles, generate study timetables, send reminders, and log feedback. Use the available tools to fulfill user requests and keep preferences up to date.
Hey, the 45‑minute study session I had this morning felt way too long. I'd prefer shorter blocks, maybe 30 minutes. Can you adjust my preferences?
Thanks for the feedback! I’ll record your experience and adjust the default study session length to 30 minutes for upcoming schedules.

arguments.comments: 45‑minute session felt too long; prefer 30‑minute blocks.

messages.content: Your feedback has been saved. I’ve updated your study‑session preference to 30‑minute blocks (with a 10‑minute break between sessions). Future timetables will reflect this change, and I’ll keep an eye on your energy profile to place the shorter sessions when you’re most alert. Let me know if you’d like me to generate a new schedule for the next week.
